hero.description: Step into a world where your imagination is the only limit. Morpho combines advanced AI with classic tabletop roleplaying to create immersive, evolving stories that adapt to your every choice.

worldGeneration.title: AI World Generation
worldGeneration.description: Describe your dream setting and watch as Morpho weaves a complete world with history, factions, and lore in seconds.

intelligentCharacters.title: Intelligent Characters
intelligentCharacters.description: Create deep, evolving characters with automated stat generation and AI-driven backstories that matter.

dynamicStorytelling.title: Dynamic Storytelling
dynamicStorytelling.description: Experience a never-ending campaign where an AI Dungeon Master adapts the narrative to your party's actions.
